t: 3:5*r Hebrew Shimea,*i a variant of Shammua*i
3:5*r One Hebrew manuscript and Vulgate (see also Septuagint and 2 Samuel 11:3); most Hebrew manuscripts Bathshua*i
3:6*r Two Hebrew manuscripts (see also 2 Samuel 5:15 and 1 Chron. 14:5); most Hebrew manuscripts Elishama*i
3:11*r Hebrew Joram,*i a variant of Jehoram*i
3:16*r Hebrew Jeconiah,*i a variant of Jehoiachin*i ; also in verse 17
